titleStmt.title: Carmen Deo nostro, te decet hymnus sacred poems, / collected, corrected, augmented, most humbly presented. To my Lady the Countesse of Denbigh by her most deuoted seruant. R.C. In heaty [sic] acknowledgment of his immortall obligation to her goodnes & charity.
titleStmt.author: Crashaw, Richard, 1613?-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Peter Targa, printer to the Arch-bishope of Paris, in S. Victors streete at the golden sunne.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "8 September 1655. June [crossed out] but nono [illegible]".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: S. Victors streete at the golden sunne.
